name: Should have Stayed Home!
description:
You play as a typical office worker. Day like any other, you were supposed to be doing some errands around the place. That pesky elevator, however, seems to have different plans for you. When it suddenly fails,  you find yourself thrown off the building, fighting for your life. Now you have to consume yellow balloons in order to keep your consciousness intact (because of course you do!). Man, you Should have Stayed Home!

Game targets low-end Android devices, however Windows version (64-bit) is also included.
